data.text: @2018_charmed @TVLine I have a good gut instinct about plot eps, it never let me down before. Once a full season is out I may give it another try. Till than I have other series I'm already invested in. Critical Role Supernatural  iZombie Warcraft to name a few. Only so much time in my life for things.

@Vexkun @TVLine No but a pilots aren’t usually good and this one was made months before the second episode was even written so it’s very different from the pilot it’s interesting and more fun your missing out but if you want to wait that’s fine

@2018_charmed @TVLine If a plot episode doesn't grab my attention, I wait till a full season is out. That way I can read about it as a whole to see if it worth my time. And also don't want to get attach to a show it case it is canned. Nothing wrong with that. Is there?

@Vexkun @TVLine Yeah but who cares what people think you watch it the second episode and you decide if its better or not you don’t need other people to tell you if its good or not bc you have a different mind you might like stuff that person doesnt like or vice versa so you should give it a shot

@2018_charmed @TVLine That not what I been hearing. And now days I perfer waiting till something over and watch all in a few days. Rewatching the original now. Maybe when the season over and hear more good things, I'll try again. There ismore entertaining series on Netflix, Twitch and other  sites

@Vexkun @TVLine Well that was the pilot it calmed down ALOT in the second episode check that out first before you decide bc a lot of people didn’t like the pilot at all and really enjoyed the second Episode

@TVLine @Melonie_Diaz @SerDariusBlain I would implore @JennieUrman to actually apologize to these women after acknowledging their hurt feelings had merit. Can u imagine they never apologized and only acknowledged the og women at all after they got backlash from the og fans? Here is Jennie admitting Holly was right https://t.co/sKOxUCeoiv
@MaxCharmed @Internaturalbaw @EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello They only quote what is of use for them. They'll never learn

@TVLine Try to get in a shot, but that first episode was a huge turn off. The reboot is some cheap unoriginal shoving an agenda down your throat at every turn. It's Charmed in name only. It's overly PC. Just wanted a fun fantasy series.

@GaryAda91916755 @TVLine Yes and then she trashed it for several years after that. She refused to allow her likeness on the show. And went on to blame Alyssa Milano for years about it. They're friends now bc Alyssa reached out after her cancer diagnosis.
https://t.co/bTozDt57yj https://t.co/BS6HCwc81D

@TVLine I would implore @Melonie_Diaz and @SerdariusBlain to be kinder too. 
Calling og fans retards and then dissing the original actresses and calling them too old to reprise their role doesn't sound kind either. https://t.co/wdqdJdgDFh
@TVLine Wasn't she fired from 2 tv shows for being extremely unkind?
@TVLine And that's why she is the best one! https://t.co/4jOiUBCcv8

@TVLine That´s sounds a bit different to me 
https://t.co/126SezMdI7
@TVLine Please don´t trust the press. They are buyest. Sound´s like the press know´s what´s going on.
@MaxCharmed @EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello So did Holly. You may want to add that as well https://t.co/4oXx7TIfDr
@Internaturalbaw @EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello She also said nice words about the reboot, you might wanna quote that too!!! https://t.co/IQEaFLuTQV
@TVLine Loved this ❤️ i like the reboot as much as the original
@EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello @EW ❤️❤️❤️

@Internaturalbaw @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello @EW Yes right! I love the Prue and Paige yers. But for me Charmed will always be Piper Phoebe and Leo. They were on for all 8 years on a show that was not without controversy. They did it for us. And i owe them everything❤️
@EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello @EW I've had it with the media and these people. Shannen now is praised for how mature and wise she is. Yes we love her but 3 vs 8 years?!?!

@Internaturalbaw @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello @EW It really is. It’s a shame that a 20 year legacy can be erased for some people with just a shitty made reboot full of click baite and disrespectfulness to the OG. Like Alyssa said. They were an after thought. Which pisses me off!

@EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello Yes! Especially TVLine and @EW it's like this show and the execs get a pass for everything! And no one paid tribute to their 20th anniversary. It's really just a shame.

@TVLine I am kindly ignoring it. As soon as I saw it was being described as "Fierce, funny, & feminist", I was even less inclined to check it out. It seems like it borrowed the basic concept from the original series, and then went a completely different direction. Pass.
@Internaturalbaw @TVLine @JennieUrman @MichaelAusiello Why does it feel like some TV news outlets are being payed to only say the positive things about the reboot. Even if they are half truths?

@EllaRose2495 @TVLine @JennieUrman Here's what Alyssa said several times. You may want to include that as well @MichaelAusiello #Charmed 
https://t.co/IV7xcyUvun
@TVLine https://t.co/5EqA6udRzy
@TVLine @JennieUrman https://t.co/ciZw11tW9f
